item.title: Use `sync.Pool` to reduce memory consumption
item.author: unknowntpo
item.description: Identifying the problem To demonstrate the improvement of our code, I design a simple benchmark, There are three ways we can get data from database. Use []Author to hold the data (Structure Binding) Use [][]string to hold the data (Unify Container without sync.Pool) Use [][]string to hold the data, and use sync.Pool to reuse [][]string (Unify Container with sync.Pool) For row number between 1000 and 8000 to demonstrate the benefit of sync.
